title: good type for elementary school teachers publication
content:
I’m doing a logo for an elementary school teachers association. Any suggestions? Please no children’s scripts.

I’m looking for professional, yet friendly, caring. Something that says “up-to-date, current,” etc, but not faddish.
author: dl

comments.content: With elementary school books I can’t help but think of Clarendons but maybe something with the timeless appeal of Nick Shinn’s new [Modern Suite](http://web.archive.org/web/20090703055738/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/shinntype/modern_suite_full_family), which feels a bit more sophisticated.
